const JobCard = ({ job, filterBtn }) => { return (
{job.company}
{job.new && NEW!} {job.featured && FEATURED}
{job.position}
{job.postedAt} • {job.contract} • {job.location}
{job.languages.map((lang) => ( ))} {job.tools.map((tool) => ( ))}
); }; export default JobCard;
